hibernate-mapping.query: select new ccoadto( c.ACODE,c.DCODE,c.CUR,c.BUDGET) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c where ( c.ACODE =: aCODE and c.DCODE =: dCODE and c.CUR =: cUR and c.Active = true )
select new ccoadto( c.ACODE, c.DCODE, c.CUR, c.BUDGET, c.UID, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedUserId, c.CreatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c where c.Active = true

select new ccoadto( c.ACODE, c.DCODE, c.CUR, c.BUDGET, c.UID, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedUserId, c.CreatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACODE = :aCODE and c.Active = true

select new ccoadto( c.ACODE, c.DCODE, c.CUR, c.BF, c.OBAL, c.HOBAL, c.CBAL, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.M13, c.MSRC1, c.MSRC2, c.MSRC3, c.MSRC4, c.MSRC5, c.MSRC6, c.MSRC7, c.MSRC8, c.MSRC9, c.MSRC10, c.MSRC11, c.MSRC12, c.MSRC13, c.BF1, c.BF2, c.BF3, c.BF4, c.BF5, c.BF6, c.BF7, c.BF8, c.BF9, c.BF10, c.BF11, c.BF12, c.BF13, c.BFSRC1, c.BFSRC2, c.BFSRC3, c.BFSRC4, c.BFSRC5, c.BFSRC6, c.BFSRC7, c.BFSRC8, c.BFSRC9, c.BFSRC10, c.BFSRC11, c.BFSRC12, c.BFSRC13, c.MREV1, c.MREV2, c.MREV3, c.MREV4, c.MREV5, c.MREV6, c.MREV7, c.MREV8, c.MREV9, c.MREV10, c.MREV11, c.MREV12, c.MREV13, c.LYMSRC1, c.LYMSRC2, c.LYMSRC3, c.LYMSRC4, c.LYMSRC5, c.LYMSRC6, c.LYMSRC7, c.LYMSRC8, c.LYMSRC9, c.LYMSRC10, c.LYMSRC11, c.LYMSRC12, c.LYMSRC13, c.SCCRBAL, c.ACCRUED, c.BUDGET, c.UID, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedUserId, c.CreatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c where c.Active = true and c.DCODE =:dcode
update CurrencyChargeOfAccount s set s.M1=s.M12, s.MSRC1=s.MSRC12, s.CBAL=s.M12, s.OBAL=s.M12, s.HOBAL=s.MSRC12, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Active = true

update CurrencyChargeOfAccount c set c.BF=0, c.M2=0, c.M3=0, c.M4=0, c.M5=0, c.M6=0, c.M7=0, c.M8=0, c.M9=0, c.M10=0, c.M11=0, c.M12=0, c.M13=0, c.MSRC2=0, c.MSRC3=0, c.MSRC4=0, c.MSRC5=0, c.MSRC6=0, c.MSRC7=0, c.MSRC8=0, c.MSRC9=0, c.MSRC10=0, c.MSRC11=0, c.MSRC12=0, c.MSRC13=0, c.BF1=0, c.BF2=0, c.BF3=0, c.BF4=0, c.BF5=0, c.BF6=0, c.BF7=0, c.BF8=0, c.BF9=0, c.BF10=0, c.BF11=0, c.BF12=0, c.BF13=0, c.BFSRC1=0, c.BFSRC2=0, c.BFSRC3=0, c.BFSRC4=0, c.BFSRC5=0, c.BFSRC6=0, c.BFSRC7=0, c.BFSRC8=0, c.BFSRC9=0, c.BFSRC10=0, c.BFSRC11=0, c.BFSRC12=0, c.BFSRC13=0, c.MREV1=0, c.MREV2=0, c.MREV3=0, c.MREV4=0, c.MREV5=0, c.MREV6=0, c.MREV7=0, c.MREV8=0, c.MREV9=0, c.MREV10=0, c.MREV11=0, c.MREV12=0, c.MREV13=0, c.LYMSRC1=0, c.LYMSRC2=0, c.LYMSRC3=0, c.LYMSRC4=0, c.LYMSRC5=0, c.LYMSRC6=0, c.LYMSRC7=0, c.LYMSRC8=0, c.LYMSRC9=0, c.LYMSRC10=0, c.LYMSRC11=0, c.LYMSRC12=0, c.LYMSRC13=0, c.SCCRBAL=0, c.ACCRUED=0, c.BUDGET= :budget, c.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where c.Active = true

select new prevccoadto( c.ACODE, a.AccountName, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.M13 ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c , ChargeOfAccount as a where c.ACODE = a.ACode and c.DCODE=a.DCODE and a.ACode = :aCode and c.CUR = :cur and c.DCODE = :sourceBr and c.Active = true and a.Active = true

select new prevccoadto ( cc.ACODE, cc.DCODE, c.AccountName, cc.CUR, cc.BF1, cc.BF2, cc.BF3, cc.BF4, cc.BF5, cc.BF6, cc.BF7, cc.BF8, cc.BF9, cc.BF10, cc.BF11, cc.BF12 ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc , ChargeOfAccount as c where cc.ACODE = c.ACode and c.ACode not like '%000' and cc.DCODE = c.DCODE and cc.Active = true and c.Active = true

update CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc set cc.BF1 = :bf1, cc.BF2 = :bf2, cc.BF3 = :bf3, cc.BF4 = :bf4, cc.BF5 = :bf5, cc.BF6 = :bf6, cc.BF7 = :bf7, cc.BF8 = :bf8, cc.BF9 = :bf9, cc.BF10 = :bf10, cc.BF11 = :bf11, cc.BF12 = :bf12, cc.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cc.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cc.ACODE = :acode and cc.DCODE = :dcode and cc.CUR = :currency and cc.Active = true

select new prevccoadto ( c.ACode, c.DCODE, c.AccountName, c.ACType, cc.CUR, cc.OBAL, cc.HOBAL ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc , ChargeOfAccount as c where cc.ACODE = c.ACode and cc.DCODE = c.DCODE and c.ACode not like '%000' and (c.ACType='A' or c.ACType='L') and cc.Active = true and c.Active = true order by c.ACType

update CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc set cc.OBAL = :obal, cc.HOBAL = :hobal, cc.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cc.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cc.ACODE = :acode and cc.DCODE = :dcode and cc.CUR = :currency and cc.Active = true

select new prevccoadto ( cc.ACODE, cc.DCODE, c.AccountName, cc.CUR, cc.BFSRC1, cc.BFSRC2, cc.BFSRC3, cc.BFSRC4, cc.BFSRC5, cc.BFSRC6, cc.BFSRC7, cc.BFSRC8, cc.BFSRC9, cc.BFSRC10, cc.BFSRC11, cc.BFSRC12 ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc , ChargeOfAccount as c where cc.ACODE = c.ACode and c.ACode not like '%000' and cc.DCODE = c.DCODE and cc.Active = true and c.Active = true

update CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc set cc.BFSRC1 = :bfsrc1, cc.BFSRC2 = :bfsrc2, cc.BFSRC3 = :bfsrc3, cc.BFSRC4 = :bfsrc4, cc.BFSRC5 = :bfsrc5, cc.BFSRC6 = :bfsrc6, cc.BFSRC7 = :bfsrc7, cc.BFSRC8 = :bfsrc8, cc.BFSRC9 = :bfsrc9, cc.BFSRC10 = :bfsrc10, cc.BFSRC11 = :bfsrc11, cc.BFSRC12 = :bfsrc12, cc.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cc.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cc.ACODE = :acode and cc.DCODE = :dcode and cc.CUR = :currency and cc.Active = true

select new prevccoadto ( cc.ACODE, cc.DCODE, cc.CUR, cc.BF, c.AccountName ) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc , ChargeOfAccount as c where cc.ACODE = c.ACode and cc.DCODE = c.DCODE and cc.ACODE not like '%000' and cc.Active = true and c.Active = true order by cc.ACODE

update CurrencyChargeOfAccount as cc set cc.BF = :bf, cc.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cc.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cc.ACODE = :acode and cc.DCODE = :dcode and cc.CUR = :currency and cc.Active = true
select new ccoadto ( c.ACODE, c.DCODE, c.CUR, c.BUDGET) from CurrencyChargeOfAccount as c where ( c.ACODE =: aCODE and c.DCODE = :dCode and c.Active = true )
